title: Ward selection is bugged in Champion Select.
body:
Just like the tittle says, as of right now the ward selection is bugged.
Half of my wards are gone and sometimes it won't even let me change it at all. It would just turn grayish and won't let me click on it.

It probably has something to do with a ward skin shard from Hextech Crafting that I got a while ago, that had a weird name, something between the lines of "ward_loot_that_bugs_your_client_Kappa."

Is it a know bug that its getting fixed with the new client? I hope not, cause I feel scammed rn xD

I've seen some posts about it, but I don't think its getting the attention it deserves.

replies.body: We're aware of an issue where some ward skins don't appear or prevent the ward skin selection box from appearing. We're currently working on a fix! This is purely visual, and you haven't lost any content! :)
